rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a north-facing entrance as per Vastu guidelines. Designed to serve as a transitional area from the outdoors into the vibrant living areas, featuring a Bohemian aesthetic with eclectic decor.

rooms.name: Bohemian Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area that embodies a free-spirited Bohemian style with mixed textures, vibrant colors and unconventional furniture arrangements.

rooms.name: Home Office / Study
rooms.description: A dedicated work space that can double as a study, integrating bohemian elements with practical design for focus and creativity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen that blends functionality with a Bohemian flair, utilizing vibrant colors and reclaimed materials while respecting local building norms.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An inviting dining space that serves both as a family eat-in area and an extension of the living room, designed with open seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom designed for relaxation and privacy, incorporating Bohemian textures, natural light from the north-facing entrance, and ample storage.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy guest room with a Bohemian touch to make visitors feel at home, featuring comfortable seating and local art.

rooms.name: Second Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional guest room designed with a Bohemian aesthetic that includes modern amenities while maintaining cultural authenticity.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed bathroom with modern fixtures and a Bohemian style, blending functionality with design.

openings.description: A north-facing entrance that complies with Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow and natural light.
Large windows in living areas, bedrooms, and kitchen to allow ample natural light and ventilation.
Interior doors designed for smooth transitions between spaces while maintaining privacy where needed.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: A versatile rooftop terrace that serves as an outdoor living space and entertainment area, complete with seating, greenery, and ambient lighting.

openings.description: A secure and aesthetically designed staircase that connects the ground floor to the rooftop terrace, ensuring compliance with local safety norms.
Skylights installed on the roof to allow natural light into adjacent spaces while maintaining privacy and energy efficiency.

vastu_considerations: North-facing entrance for positive energy flow.
Proper alignment of living areas with sunlight.
Integration of open spaces that encourage social interaction and relaxation.

design_principles.description: Emphasis on eclectic decor, vibrant colors, and unconventional arrangements to create a relaxed atmosphere.
Maximizes space utilization with open areas and defined zones for living, dining, work, and guest spaces.
Utilization of natural lighting, ventilation, and eco-friendly materials in keeping with local building norms.
